snippet: General Motors is recalling vehicles because a warning chime is inoperative and because air bags may not deploy in a crash.
abstract: General Motors is recalling about 105,500 vehicles in two actions; first because warning chime is inoperative and second because air bags may not deploy in crashes.

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER JENSEN and DANIELLE IVORY

lead_paragraph: General Motors is recalling vehicles because a warning chime is inoperative and because air bags may not deploy in a crash.
